summary: Iteration 10 - Final pre-deployment testing for logo replacement and performance optimization. All logo images correctly show /logo.png (not text 'Q') across Navbar, Landing footer, Presale header, and Portfolio Holdings. Lazy loading works correctly for all pages. Favicon updated to /logo.png. Vite build config has terser minification and manual chunks. No console errors.
critical_code_review_comments: Logo replacement verified: Navbar (line 48-50), Landing footer (line 257), Presale header (line 94-96), Portfolio Holdings (line 150) - all use /logo.png
Lazy loading implemented via React.lazy() for all pages in App.jsx
Vite build config includes terser minification with drop_console and manual chunks for vendor/crypto
HTML has preconnect hints for Google Fonts
Favicon and apple-touch-icon both set to /logo.png in index.html
context_for_next_testing_agent: All logo replacement complete and verified. Lazy loading working. Performance optimizations in place. Preview URL: https://deep-link-wallet.preview.emergentagent.com

lazy_loading_verified.note: React.lazy() with Suspense fallback PageLoader component

connect_callback_page.error_handling: Shows 'Parametres Phantom manquants' error with redirect

profile_toggles.alignment: Properly aligned on desktop and mobile (375px)
